attributes.action: Scrap the ID scheme as it is for the rich to keep tabs on the poor. No-one should be exempt or all should be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are a politicion, high profile personality etc. you are exempt from your details being known and spread abroad. Yet another special deal for the rich, along with business perks, tax exemption... need I go on?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
